Articles.Content: what is your favorite game other than KSP
gta v hands down, i obsess about it almost as much as ksp

At the moment?

Sails of Glory: http://www.aresgames.eu/category/games/sails-of-glory-games
GTA V Online: It works really well. 16 people running around a virtual state, each of them trying to kill the other. Like real life!
War Thunder, I've been spending my whole summer when ever I have free time on this game... I should probably go outside for a change...

Wargame: Airland Battle, Wargame: European Escalation, and Wargame: Red Dragon. Might be changed to Fallout: Equestria (game) when it comes out.

Edited August 3, 2014 by General Rarity
Hmm. Lots of games, probably Minecraft, Civ, or the Sims series... but theres a LOT of gamges I like
I play a lot of games. If I had to choose it would be either DayZ Standalone, Take on Mars, GTA V Online, or Gmod. Like Destroyer there's a lot of games I like.

The Portal series.

Edit: also the Myst series.

I would say Portal, I've never had as much fun playing anything as I had playing Portal 2, however, it has a low replay value. Once you know how to do everything, it becomes somewhat boring.

I think my favourite is Mirror's Edge, because even though the levels are quite linear, there's still a lot of ways to go through it. You can gun down everything that moves and you can, with a bit of luck, get through it without much blood. I think there are only maybe 10 or so enemies that you have to kill, but I'm unsure about most of them, I could be completely wrong.

Then again, I haven't had a joystick in a long time, I would really like to play Falcon F4.0 AF again. And Lock On. And Il2 Sturmovik. And War Thunder on Realistic. And many other flight simulators which I could probably play all day. I don't know if I'd like any of these more, but I probably would.

War Thunder, Civilization V, Mount and Blade: Warband, Far Cry 3, Battlefield 3 & 4, Red Orchestra 2, Sniper Elite V2, Bioshock Infinite, and Chivalry.

I'd really like to get Space Engineers as well. Kingdom Come: Deliverance looks amazing and I can't wait for that.
Mass Effect series tops out after KSP, then a bunch of other stuff. If KSP is aleph null, Mass Effect is Graham's Number, and most of the other stuff is stuck waay below that.

GTA V. No question. I'm not even at level 10 in Online, but I always play SP. Trevor's fighter jet is the best thing I have flown in a GTA game. Hopefully, they add in a Space DLC, where for $50,000,000, you can buy your own SLS.

GTA V. No question. I'm not even at level 10 in Online, but I always play SP. Trevor's fighter jet is the best thing I have flown in a GTA game. Hopefully, they add in a Space DLC, where for $50,000,000, you can buy your own SLS.

<OldMan>

Damn kids nowadays with their new-fangled SLS's and dragons with fancy computers inside. Back in my day we had Geminis and Saturns with almost nonexistant computers and dialed gauges, and by god we were happy! Kids today oughta try gettin' to the Moon with only a little bit of those computers they got now and only usin' the dialed gauges we loved for so many years, that oughta set 'em straight!

</OldMan>

Seriously, if I did have GTA V, I'd wanna pilot a Mercury, Gemini, Or Saturn a heck of a lot more than an SLS.

Halo or TF2. Ugh. Can't decide

(btw Halo Reach of course)
Roblox is very fun. I've played it since 2008.

War Thunder, whit its glorious overpowered soviet planes, overtiered japanese aviation, too many bad USA pilots, overtiered and weak Luftwaffe, and the mighty Sea Meteor F3 Jesus !

Edited August 3, 2014 by Zaryulenko

List of favorite games!

1 Spore and KSP

2 G-Mod

3 Goat Simulator

4 RoboCraft

5 Soulcaliber IV

At the moment?

Tie between World in Conflict and Twisted Insurection(stand alone mod for C&C Tiberian Sun).
Day of Defeat

Currently Age of Empires 2, UrbanTerror (freeware) and Supremacy1914 (online). Also, I have thought about getting SpinTires.

For some reason, I don't like GTA V (but I love other GTAs), feels too arcadey.
Right now World Of Tanks and Fifa14 are on number 2 for me, with Gran Turismo 6 on a close third place

ALL THE RESIDENT EVIL GAMES.

The 2002 Gamecube Remake is coming to last and next gen, and pc! IM SO EXCITED

Megaman.

(10chars)
Total Annihilation. Yep, it's 17 years old, but I still love it.
